metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12402 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The file name encoding algorithm used internally in Apache Commons Compress 1.15 to 1.18 can get into an infinite loop when faced with specially crafted inputs. This can lead to a denial of service attack if an attacker can choose the file names inside of an archive created by Compress.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
